mission.text: World Blazing Computer Institute exists to help students in Hadapsar and across Pune move from "I don't know where to start" to job-ready confidence through practical IT training, small batches, and one-to-one mentoring.

different.title: What makes us different?
different.intro: Not just theory or YouTube-style tutorials. We focus on career outcomes with guided practice.
points: Small batches & personal attention – every student gets time with the trainer.
Project-based learning – build real web apps, dashboards and campaigns, not just notes.
Offline + Online flexibility – continue learning even if your schedule changes.
Mentors from industry – trainers with real experience in development, testing, analytics & marketing.

results.title: Results & success stories
results.intro: World Blazing students are working in IT companies across Pune and India in roles like Full Stack Developer, QA Engineer, Data Analyst and Digital Marketer.
results.disclaimer: *Numbers are based on internal tracking of students who completed projects and interview preparation with us.
